about.aboutDescription: I am a web developer with skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript. I have been using Angular for two years in a professional setting to develop web applications. I also have a basic knowledge of React, acquired through a course, and a foundational understanding of Node.js for creating REST APIs.
